name: ukiyo-tone
description: Monorepo build orchestrator for Ukiyo-Tone editor themes inspired by 17th-century Japanese Ukiyo-e art and mineral pigments.

scripts.package:vscode: npm run build:vscode && mkdir -p dist && (cd editors/vscode && npx @vscode/vsce package --out ../../dist/ukiyo-tone-vscode.vsix)
scripts.package:zed: npm run build:zed && test -f editors/zed/extension.toml && test -f editors/zed/themes/ukiyo-tone.json && mkdir -p dist && tar -czf dist/ukiyo-tone-zed.tar.gz -C editors/zed extension.toml LICENSE themes
scripts.package:all: npm run clean && npm run package:vscode && npm run package:zed
